short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy web-based HTML and DIV Tables to clipboard with ease, supporting dynamic tables and sanitized output

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily copy any HTML table from the webpage to your clipboard and paste it directly into Microsoft Excel, CSV files, Google Sheets, or Office 365â€”no formatting errors, no hassle!

Updated: 6 Oct 2024

Key Features:

- One-click copying of HTML tables.
- Seamless pasting into Excel, Google Sheets, and other spreadsheet apps.
- Retains table structure, formatting, and data accuracy.
- Perfect for exporting data from websites to CSV or other formats.

Ideal for students, data analysts, and anyone who works with tables on the web. Save time by quickly transferring data from the web to your favorite spreadsheet tool!

How To Use: 

1.Install and enable the extension. 
2. This will add a Copy Table options in your right click menu. 
3. Click in or near the table, Use Copy Table from your right click menu to add the table data to the clipboard.
4.Go to your favorite sheets app (Google Sheets, Excel) and paste.

Recent Updates: 
1.0.1: Include DIV-based tables.
